property.name: airbnb.reair.audit_log.db.jdbc
property.comment: JDBC connection URL to the MySQL instance containing the audit log. The URL should include the DB name as well.

property.name: airbnb.reair.audit_log.db.user
property.comment: Username for the audit log MySQL DB

property.name: airbnb.reair.audit_log.db.password
property.comment: Password for the audit log DB

property.name: airbnb.reair.audit_log.db.table
property.comment: Name of the audit log MySQL table

property.name: airbnb.reair.audit_log.objects.db.table
property.comment: Name of the audit objects MySQL table

property.name: airbnb.reair.audit_log.map_red_stats.db.table
property.comment: Name of the mapreduce stats MySQL table

property.name: airbnb.reair.state.db.jdbc
property.comment: JDBC connection URL to the MySQL instance that contains the state tables. The URL should include the DB name as well.

property.name: airbnb.reair.state.db.user
property.comment: Username for MySQL instance containing the state tables.

property.name: airbnb.reair.state.db.password
property.comment: Password for MySQL instance containing the state tables.

property.name: airbnb.reair.state.db.table
property.comment: Name of the table containing replication job details.

property.name: airbnb.reair.state.kv.db.table
property.comment: Name of the table containing key/value pairs.

property.name: airbnb.reair.clusters.src.name
property.comment: Name of the source cluster. It can be an arbitrary string and is used in logs, tags, etc.

property.name: airbnb.reair.clusters.src.metastore.url
property.comment: Source metastore Thrift URL.

property.name: airbnb.reair.clusters.src.hdfs.root
property.comment: Source cluster HDFS root

property.name: airbnb.reair.clusters.src.hdfs.tmp
property.comment: Directory for temporary files on the source cluster.

property.name: airbnb.reair.clusters.dest.name
property.comment: Name of the source cluster. It can be an arbitrary string and is used in logs, tags, etc.

property.name: airbnb.reair.clusters.dest.metastore.url
property.comment: Destination metastore Thrift URL.

property.name: airbnb.reair.clusters.dest.hdfs.root
property.comment: Destination cluster HDFS root.

property.name: airbnb.reair.clusters.dest.hdfs.tmp
property.comment: Directory for temporary files on the source cluster. Table / partition data is copied to this location before it is moved to the final location, so it should be on the same filesystem as the final location.

property.name: airbnb.reair.object.filter
property.comment: Name of the class used to filter out entries from replication

property.name: airbnb.reair.worker.threads
property.comment: Number of worker threads. Each worker threads process one entry at a time.

property.name: airbnb.reair.jobs.in_memory_count
property.comment: Number of jobs that can be kept in memory. Typically, this is a large nubmer so that historical jobs can be referenced.

property.name: airbnb.reair.thrift.port
property.comment: Port that the thrift service should listen on.
